name: @fishan/cdiff
description: A lightweight utility for creating, applying, and inverting compact, single-coordinate diff patches with block operation support.
author: Aleks Fishan a.fishan@gmail.com

scripts.build:minify: terser dist/cdiff.js --output dist/cdiff.min.js --compress --mangle && terser dist/cdiff_chars.js --output dist/cdiff_chars.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:minify
scripts.benchmark: npm run build && node benchmarks/fetch-data.js && node --loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings benchmarks/index.ts
